lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins, not resting after their turnaround season, signed two former Stanley Cup winners yesterday in right wing Petr Sykora and defenseman Darryl Sydor. The signings add playoff experience to one of the N.H.L.’s youngest teams, which includes the young stars Sidney Crosby, Evgeni Malkin, Ryan Whitney and Jordan Staal.
